website_summaries.verdict: Organic vitamin and herbal supplement that increases breastmilk production by 50 percent.
pros: Loved by new mothers for increasing energy and milk production
Gluten, soy, corn, and dairy free
cons: Can be acidic because contains citrus
A minority of reviewers noticed no change in energy or milk production

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow & effective
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Actif Prenatal Vitamins while pregnant, and found them much easier to swallow than other brands, and they left no aftertaste. I also liked that they use Folate as opposed to Folic Acid. After my child was born, I switched to Actif Post Natal Vitamins. You take two of these per day, as opposed to one prenatal. And they deliver all the vitamins and minerals a nursing mother needs. My baby and I have been thriving post delivery. We are both getting vital nutrients we need, and my milk production has been great. I think these vitamins have played a part in that, and I highly recommend them to fellow moms.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Best ones I've found!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that these are POST-NATAL vitamins, which you never find. It doesn't seem like one would need the same vitamins as growing a baby versus nursing a baby. The folate is food derived instead of synthesized folic acid which is what I was looking for. These pills seem large but go down very easy. I've never gagged or had an issue swallowing these vitamins, unlike 99% of the other ones on the market. These are tasteless, don't leave disgusting fish burps in your mouth hours later and don't cause an upset stomach. I highly recommend to anyone who has the bank account to purchase them. Seriously, why are these so expensive?
customer_reviews.author: stewartt

customer_reviews.title: Buy these and thank yourself later
customer_reviews.text: I used this companies prenatal vitamin and have been equally impressed with the postnatal. When I started to have issues with my BM supply I went online and purchased these and have never had a problem since I take them daily. They are a little on the larger size but easy to swallow bc of the soft capsule. Don’t buy those cheap, hard or gummy vitamins at the pharmacy...your body can’t access the vitamins in that Little Rock or in a gummy....read up on it! Your body literally poops most of those nutrients out. Pay a little more and get quality, digestible vitamins. You are not what you eat, you are what you absorb!
customer_reviews.author: Shelicia A.

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye postpartum hair loss!
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this postnatal vitamin from a different big brand and am so glad I did! Actif has food based ingredients instead of synthetic folic acid which can cause problems for some people. I also noticed when I started this vitamin my postpartum hair loss stopped and having now taken this vitamin for a few months my hair is growing back in! It also has wonderful lactation support for breast feeding moms. I am so pleased with this vitamin I have recommended it to all my pregnant and postpartum moms.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Lane

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product and Natural Ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product and organic ingredients from REAL food sources! I took these through my breastfeeding journey and their prenatal through my pregnancy. I felt wonderful during both! The most important thing to me was organic quality and content, more specifically FOLATE over FOLIC ACID as they are now finding folic acid may be difficult for the body to breakdown. I felt comfortable knowing the ingredient sources and will always recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jmf1219

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for busy moms!
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice to combine the nursing supplements that I need to take with a prenatal vitamin to cut down on the number of pills I have to take everyday! I am still pregnant so I haven't had a chance to give these a shot yet, but with my first I took fenugreek on and off throughout my nursing journey, and of course took prenatal vitamins everyday, so this is a great combo. I'm surprised more companies don't offer this!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Helped support milk supply!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that these vitamins provided me with the extra nutrients I need for breastfeeding. Especially, because they are sourced naturally. I am over 8 month into exclusively breast feeding, with an excellent milk supply. I know that these vitamins are a contributing factor to this success. It also helps that they are easy to swallow, and don’t leave any bad after taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely preferred for the next post baby.
customer_reviews.text: My wife did not get sick 1 time while taking these. Our baby was born 8.4 super healthy pounds with a never ending appetite. Mom didn't have any issues at all. No teeth sensitivity and milk production is on the "up and up".
customer_reviews.author: GarbageMan

customer_reviews.title: Good postnatal with everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the post-natal vitamin as I am still breastfeeding and wanted the extra supplements to support myself and my baby. I have been very pleased with Actif. The soft gel isn't too big and swallowing isn't difficult. There is no taste or smell either. My only complaint is that I did receive a defective bottle of pills that must have melted during transport, but Actif was great about the return. No complaints and I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Please read
customer_reviews.text: I wish I realized sooner this was the cause of my sudden anxiety, depression and anger. OMG I just blamed post partum, I was fine for three months then BAM. I still took these for a month not realizing it was these. No clue what is in a vitamin to make that happen. I thought I was crazy until I looked at reviews and others had the same experience. Two days without them now and I feel much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchkins

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I used Actif prenatals and loved how they made me feel. So I had my baby and finished what I had left of my prenatals and off and on struggled with low milk supply. Ok so now I decided to try these postnatal vitamins. I was skeptical but tried them anyway. My hair falling out has slowed! My milk supply doesn't suffer any more and I feel amazing! Also these have turmeric in them! I wish I had known about them sooner! I'll be buying them from now on! If you're doubting, don't! Just buy them! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah B.

customer_reviews.title: Causes mastitis
customer_reviews.text: Do not use this if you have a decent milk supply or had issues with oversupply in the past. I’m 3m PP. I’ve only been taking 1 of these a day (the recommenced dose is 2) and within 4 days of being on these I got the worst case of mastitis in my life. It literally came on within 2 hours of not nursing my daughter (she nurses every 3-4 hours). I don’t typically leave reviews, but I wanted to warn other moms. This WILL increase your supply and if your prone to mastitis, BE CAREFUL! My boobs are constantly leaking since I started taking these and I’ve only taken half the dose!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Arsenault

customer_reviews.title: Body doesn’t absorb them
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, but once I started taking them, they turned my urine a highlighter yellow color, which to me meant that they were probably not getting absorbed. The weirdest thing was that my pumped breastmilk also turned slightly but noticeably yellow-green. After I stopped taking them, all went back to normal. Other multivitamins and my previous prenatal never did this.
customer_reviews.author: worldlib777

customer_reviews.title: RECOMMEND .Best vitamins ever!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I started taking these vitamins, I noticed an increase in energy, mental clarity, better appetite control and i dont feel lightheaded much anymore. I take them with food cuz once I took on empty stomach I had real bad nausea. I love these vitamins and will continue taking while nursing my baby. No increase in milk supply, but im still able to breastfeed all night while supplementing at least twice with formula during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mila.

customer_reviews.title: BIG NO for Hypothyroidism
customer_reviews.text: Do not take these if you have Hypothyroidism! It does contain fenugreek which is bad for our thyroid. I am not sure if that had the big affect. But I took this for almost 3 weeks and my milk supply is almost none existant compared to before! After not taking it for 2 days my supply has already started to get better. But this really messed my already low supply up.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Helped with lactation
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this product shortly after my baby came and it helped me lactate so much that I had to stop taking it. I also felt like my hormones were all over the place so I stopped taking all my vitamin supplements to help stabilize my hormones naturally. I haven't needed to start taking these pill again but certainly will once I start being more active in my day to day activities. My baby is 4 months along. The pill is large and not easy to swallow if you struggle to get pills down in general. I would take it with food or without food and it didn't seem to upset my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow - no smell!
customer_reviews.text: These pills go down amazingly. I also took the actif Prenatal’s but they were a b difficult to swallow because of the shape. These postnatal pills are a bit strong as I get nausea if I take them on an empty stomach but if I take it with food, I have no issue. I haven’t noticed a supply increase yet but I haven’t noticed a decrease either. They have no smell to them which I love. I’d buy them again as I see no issues with them as long as I take them on an empty stomach. I will also be purchasing their Prenatal’s as well soon again!
customer_reviews.author: Quinton

customer_reviews.title: Helps with general health AND milk supply!
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this after taking a prenatal plus a milk supply supplement to see if I could streamline the number of pills I take every day. So far, so milk supply issues!! I feel good, and like that the pills are easy to take. I take both in the morning and don’t feel queasy at all. No after taste either. A little sow diet than Actif’s prenatal supplement, but a savings since I don’t need to take a separate milk supply booster supplement anymore.
customer_reviews.author: E.Moser

customer_reviews.title: Good basic post natal vitamin, $organic
customer_reviews.text: Was a great post natal vitamin for simpler needs, but of quality ingredients since organics are a must for me and safe ingredients while lactating! I paired it with some other multi-mineral supplements I was finishing up then I switched to their prenatal for more comprehensive supplement needs since it includes digestive enzymes and probiotics.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Really great postnatal vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I have reordered these vitamins multiple times since giving birth to my sweet little girl. I am exclusively breastfeeding and I wanted to make sure to take a good postnatal vitamin. These don’t smell horrible or have a terrible aftertaste. They are fairly big but they don’t seem to be significantly bigger than any prenatals I took and they are still easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!! Natural ingredients
customer_reviews.text: These postnatal vitamins where a hit with my wife! She felt completely rejuvenated after she stared taking these. She was having a hard time just getting out bed, now she’s getting up early then before and doing things she didn’t have the motivation to do before! Amazing stuff would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: josiah

customer_reviews.title: You might lose your milk!
customer_reviews.text: 1. My milk supply dropped immensely. I stopped taking this to regain my usual milk production and I HAD TO SUPPLEMENT WITH FORMULA :( 2. Turned my pee to a shocking vibrant yellow. 3. Expensive! This brand did not work for me. I'm surprised it has so many good reviews. I have maybe 70-80 pills left over that I don't even want to give to friends 'cause they might lose their milk too.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole B

customer_reviews.title: Great prenatal vitamins
customer_reviews.text: These prenatal vitamins are great. They are very easy to swallow because of their soft shell coating. They don’t have a medicine smell like other vitamins do. The ingredients are very clear to understand and I like that these are organic ingredients. The shipping was fast and packaged very well. I highly recommend these prenatal vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.A

customer_reviews.title: Great Postnatal Vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking Actif Postnatal vitamins 6 months after my pregnancy as I was looking to switch to a different brand. I never had any problems tolerating these vitamins and love that I only have to take one a day! Even though they are large in size, they are easy for me to swallow. Being a sleep deprived mom, I also noticed it helped my mood. I find it valuable to pay more money and buy good quality vitamins since after all you are passing these nutrients on to your baby while breastfeeding. Due to these vitamins, I continue to breastfeed my 17 month old and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Mrunal Patel

customer_reviews.title: NO Outrageous Postpartum -- Part of my morning regimen
customer_reviews.text: To keep it simple, so you actually read this. I had a pretty unusual and stressful pregnancy/post-natal and I researched all the natural allies I could find. I have been taking a couple tinctures for stress and the occasional herbal tea...BUT I have felt the most amazing support while taking ACTIF Postnatal vitamin. My baby is 4 more months now, strictly BMF and thriving. I am a single mom and have good energy, feel strong and my hair is NOT falling out (like everyone says it is supposed to...) These vitamins must actually be full of all that goodness that they SAY that they are! Have recommended to friends who are not producing enough milk. FULLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Good Postnatal!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously been using the prenatal vitamins of the same brand, and liked them a lot. When I switched to these, I was pleased with them as well. They are not too big, don't have a flavor, and don't upset my stomach. I like that it says where the ingredients are derived from. I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great Post Natal
customer_reviews.text: I specifically looked for a post-natal as I needed additional supplementation support. This product delivered on it results. My nails, hair and skins did well on this product. I discontinued the product due to my infant developing a terrible skin rash. Unsure of the initial "trigger" I went on a very strict elimination diet and restricted all supplements, dairy, gluten, ect... I do plan to resume taking this company's product(s) after I stop exclusively breastfeeding. I would highly recommend. I gave the remaining supplements to my Aunt and she has since ordered her own bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients but poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: After a suggestion from a friend, I ordered these after my daughter was born to keep up my milk supply. They arrived all stuck to one another like they had been exposed to extreme temperatures. I had to shake the bottle and attempt to pry then apart with a fork (because they were not coming apart) , which obviously caused some to open up making a big mess. That being said, there was no bad after taste and they didn’t make me nauseous even if I took them in an empty stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Pardue

customer_reviews.title: Came back up every time.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, but I threw up every time! The first time, I assumed I just didn’t have enough in my stomach. So I tried right after eating a LARGE meal. Still threw it up, along with everything I ate. Tried a few more times after eating, and they’re just not for me. Came back out over and over. I will say, the ingredients look good so if you have a stomach of TRUE iron, I’m sure they’ll work for you. I thought I did, but this proved me wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Natural Post Natals
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I found this product. I was 6mo pp and still taking prenatals. I read about postnatals and started doing my research. This product is the best overall when it comes to natural, wholesome ingredients. I try to do my best in picking things that will be the most beneficial to my vital health, and this hit the mark. I highly recommend. And the delivery was quick, which worked great for a busy, working mom who runs short on time and forgets (some) things. I ordered them and they were delivered within a couple days. This was my second order. I am now 11mo pp and have benefited from this product greatly! Thank you, Actif.
customer_reviews.author: Momma B

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes too much isn't a good thing
customer_reviews.text: I began taking this when I was a few months postpartum. i am also nursing, so I want to make sure to take a good quality vitamin. While I love the ingredients and that its organic, my issue is the B12. I just got my blood work results back from my annual physical, and my B12 levels are through the roof! The amount of B12 in this vitamin is excessive and it showed. So unfortunately, I am on the hunt for a new postnatal that has the right level of nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: bblue19

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it’s coincidence, but since I started ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’s coincidence, but since I started taking it, I been feeling very depressed, tired, having anxiety attacks, hallucinating.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey and Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mama
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about energy levels, mood swings and hair loss, so I started taking these vitamins daily as soon as I gave birth. I havent had any of these postpartum symptoms and I'm happy with this purchase. And, it's also a lactation supplement too which is a plus. As long as I drink plenty of water, I've been able to produce daily for my 5 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to take one vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using ACTIF for over 6 months now and I have no negatives. I was looking for a prenatal that only needed to be taken once a day, had vitamins taken from whole food ingredients and supported my vitamin needs post birth. I've had no adverse reactions thus far and will be using them going forward.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Great Organic Postnatal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife after she had our first child in April. I was looking for a product that would not upset her stomach and that was easy to swallow, and that wouldn't upset the baby as she was breastfeeding. The product worked well, did not upset her stomach and she had energy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Really great post natal vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I did a lot of research to find the right post natal vitamin and these delivered across the board! I stopped taking them (because I would forget) and noticed that my hair started falling out and my milk production was lowering. I’m not sure if it was a coincidence or not, but I started taking these daily and don’t plan on stopping for a while! There was a difference in scent and flavor between the two bottles I’ve ordered. The first bottle was scent less and odorless. The second bottle had a bit of a fishy smell. I’m still taking them though.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: increased milk supply too much....
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product 8 weeks after my son was born and my previously purchased prenatals were all used up, almost immediately did I notice my already great milk supply SOARED to the point I was engorged every night and began getting clogged milk ducts. I will finish up the bottle by taking one dose every few days and supplementing with another brand, I'm bummed because I like all of the ingredients, they just work too well for my body!! Also if the addition of choline excites you, do some research and maybe get an additional choline supplement as well, I take 975 MG/day which was emphatically approved by my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dorn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful postnatal vitamin option
customer_reviews.text: I took the prenatal version of this vitamin and did very well with it. I was so happy to see there was a postnatal version of the vitamin. I have food allergies (dairy, gluten and soy) and have never once reacted towards either vitamin option. I trusted the brand and happily moved onto the postnatal version after my son was born. Not only did a not reacted adversely to the vitamins, allergy wise, but I also found the vitamin did not upset my stomach no matter what time of day I took it. I did typically take it with some type of smoothie or food item but I have a sensitive stomach and I could tolerate it well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, Terrible side effects
customer_reviews.text: The pills themselves looked to be great and no flavor. They did boost my energy however I got these approximately ten days ago and since using my milk supply has remained the same possibly even depleted. My scalp is so dry it’s unbearable and my hair has started to fall out. I am four months postpartum and was using centrum hair skin and nails prenatal gummies beforehand and was not having these issues. Will not be using these again.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Gross find in the bottle.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this bottle there was a different foreign pill among the vitamins that looked like it had partially disintegrated.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Breastfeeding Moms
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for postnatal vitamins designed for breastfeeding mothers and found this product. So far working great and I like the softgels. They are easy to swallow and don't have any weird aftertaste.
customer_reviews.author: Catladybug

customer_reviews.title: Love these vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these vitamins. Only ones I've ever had that don't upset my stomach or leave a fowl taste in my mouth. Milk supply has been awesome too while taking these. I also love the packaging on the bottle and the color of the pills. Theyre very smooth and easy to swallow. I like them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Audrina Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Spendy but worth every penny. I dont make a whole lot of money. But health is number one!
customer_reviews.text: No folic acid they use real folate from lemons. Just overall amazing. I recommend them to all the ppl I care about. Will continue to buy them. I am easily nauseous these didnt affect me whatsoever. You suppose to take a few a day. I only take one. Cuz i think thats all I need. But anyways still makes me feel great and positive
customer_reviews.author: tina moncada

customer_reviews.title: great multipurpose postnatal vitamin
customer_reviews.text: it’s a pill, so i don’t expect it to taste amazing or anything. it’s pretty tasteless. easy to swallow. i like that it’s 100% natural. it does change the color of my urine to a neon color but that’s typical of any vitamins. i just noticed that it helps with mood and lactation which is great since i am breastfeeding. i’ve had no issues so far and i’ve been taking this product for months now.
customer_reviews.author: Trang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Postnatal Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I love these post natal vitamins. They are not cheap but I feel so much more energetic when I take them, which is huge considering how exhausting small children are ha! I can really tell a difference, which says a lot. I have 3 kids (6,3 and 11 months) and have breast fed into each pregnancy so I have tried my fair share of prenatal and postnatal vitamins and these are my favorites for post baby. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KittyCatC

customer_reviews.title: Take Good Care of Your ( post baby) Self: Get these!
customer_reviews.text: Raise your hand if you took/ take a prenatal vitamin! Now, raise your hand if you took/take a POST Natal vitamin. Mmmm. Yes. I was in that boat too. After you've had that baby (major props, you did it!), your body goes through new changes that can be supported better by using a post natal vitamin. Hello, lactation and uterus toning! What better way to get all that than from an organic multivitamin that’s vegan and free of all the unwanted allergens. Love this. Which reminds me, it’s about time to buy another bottle. Nursing takes a lot out of a person!
customer_reviews.author: Jonna

customer_reviews.title: Organic Source of Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I took this brand's prenatal and now their post-natal vitamin. I really like that they are affordable and full of organic and natural ingredients. You do have to take 2 post-natals and only 1 pre-natal, making the post more expensive by double. That is my reason for 4 starts instead of 5. I'm not sure why that is. Overall, pleased. I feel my body is able to uptake the nutrients from this vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: The Allens

customer_reviews.title: They make me feel so nauseous!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins looked so promising with great reviews, quality ingredients and high price. Unfortunately, they make me so nauseous! Every day I felt like throwing up and after ruling out everything else, I found out it's because of these pills. I stopped using them before I even finished the package and went back to my CVS brand prenatals that don't make me feel that way.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the tummy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a couple weeks after the birth of my daughter. I had been struggling with a low breast milk supply and wanted to find a multivitamin that also had some herbs to aid with lactation. After taking them a few days, I did notice an increase in my supply. They are easy on my stomach too which is a plus since I've encountered nausea with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Aracely N.

customer_reviews.title: Best Postnatal Vitamin for the busy breastfeeding mama!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect supplements for a busy breastfeeding mama! I try to eat balanced meals, but these supplements ensure I’m providing my baby and myself the nutrients needed through the day. I did a lot of research before making my choice on a vitamin, and Actif Postnatal had everything covered for me. The pills aren’t huge, so they’re easy to swallow. The dosage is 2 soft gels. So if I feel like I’ve got a lot of my daily vitamins from my meals I can just take 1 that day. I really like that the ingredients are naturally sourced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great postnatal containing galactagogue!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a postnatal vitamin, and this one had the added benefit of containing galactagogue herbs! My daughter is 18 months old now, so my supply has really down regulated as she only nurses twice a day now. A little boost to your milk supply is always a good thing! Additionally, these vitamins are liquid filled which aids in adsorption. You also don’t have to take a ton per day - only two! This vitamin checks a lot of boxes on my list, and I’ve been happy with my decision to use these going on 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lucente-Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the weeks after I gave birth and since it usually takes a couple of weeks for my milk to come in I desired to give these a try. I was not disappointed! I started noticing a difference by the end of the day and woke up very full. I would recommend these for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lexie

customer_reviews.title: Pure organic ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love that these vitamins are all natural organic and have not only fenugreek and raspberry leaf, but also spirulina and turmeric that I normally would need to take separately as they are not part of any other multivitamin.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: The best you'll find!
customer_reviews.text: I love this postnatal. I think our prenatal and postnatal needs differ, and am so thankful for this high quality supplement to support me on this journey. The whole food quality ingredients are a major plus, as is the FOLATE; these are two factors I will not sacrifice in my search. Larger size that is standard for a multi. I was alternating this with my remaining prenatals after baby was born, and could tell the difference (improvement) when I switched to just these. I'm an oversupplier, so can't speak much to that side of things. These are WONDERFUL.
customer_reviews.author: Christi K.

customer_reviews.title: Feel good about what you're taking
customer_reviews.text: Love these postnatal vitamins, you get all that you need in one pill. Makes me feel great and I actually feel more energized after taking it! I recommend it to all my girlfriends that just had a child! Will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Used their prenatal as well. These are bigger and you have to take two per day but they don’t bother your stomach and I feel the difference taking them vs. not. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlupe

customer_reviews.title: Great for breastfeeding full time working mom with sjogrens
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this for my wife after reading a lot of reviews. She is a working mom and after the full time job she has to take care of the baby too. She is exclusively breastfeeding, although we have started a few solids now.She has Sjogrens and eating plaquenil daily for that.She told me that while on Actif postnatal vitamin she felt better. Now that she has changed her postnatal vitamin to some other brand, she has again started feeling pain and tiredness again. I will buy again for her as her wellbeing is important to me and my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Shubhama Kashyapa

customer_reviews.title: Good PP meds
customer_reviews.text: I liked these pills because of the ingredients. Most lactation pills have fenugreek which makes my stomachs upset. But that in mind, multivitamins in generally always made my stomach upset, which is why I would take any and all my multivitamins at night during bed time. Yes, I know that this suggests to take it in morning but this is what worked for me. The pills are normal size like other multivitamins but easy to swallow with water. Am a subscriber of the med and I am happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Zainab S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Prenatal / lactation Multi Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: This prenatal/post partum multivitamin has all the vitamin and minerals that my daughter needed. It was easy to swallow and it did not make my daughter feel nauseous or gassy. She also liked that it has supplements to support lactation. We would buy again and also would recommend to others this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: Great postnatal vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I liked this postnatal vitamin. It really made me feel great! But even a half dose is too much for my body and my OBGNY recommended for me to stop taking it because it was turning my pee a bright neon yellow after only 1 pill. They said that meant it had too much of a certain vitamin in it (for my body). So, I gave it to a friend. I only weigh 102lbs so I’m not sure if that’s the issue of why it was too much for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy M

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t buy these for a boost in milk supply, but I was surprised when that happened. These are pricey, but truly high quality. I definitely noticed a difference in my energy after switching to these. They are big pills, but you only swallow two in the morning - totally doable. I do it on an empty stomach with no problem, though I do eat shortly thereafter. Great product,
customer_reviews.author: Zeyna S.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect holistic multivitamin for women!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite vitamins! I love this brand and it’s natural healing and mineral boosts! It truly makes you feel healthier, in my opinion. The gels are easy to swallow even though the pill is rather large. I hope you benefit from this! I look forward to buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Malika

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes good sometimes not
customer_reviews.text: I loved when I received these correctly. Second time ordering I received the prenatal pills which I have sent back. I ordered again another order for the post natal and received a bottle with the seal broken. I am now returning those as well. I need someone from customer service to contact me about the return as both were sent in 1 package. I loved them when I was using them but will not be ordering again due to these 2 issues and having no way of contacting customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jaquelyn Kramer.l, Realtor

customer_reviews.title: Natural, no odor, and easy to swallow coating.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a all natural vitamin to take while still breastfeeding and I am glad to have found this one. Besides being organic with natural ingredients, I also wanted it to have no odor and to have an easy to swallow coating. I would have given it 5 stars if they offered the option to be monthly subscription so we could get a little discount since it is expensive. Also would have preferred to take 1 pill rather than 2 but I guess they can’t fit it all into 1.
customer_reviews.author: veronicandida

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin for breast-feeding mamas
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a great post-natal after my baby boy was born, & I was so pleased with this product. I exclusively breast fed for 6 months & this product provided me with all the nutrients my body needed to heal & promote lactation for my baby. Vitamin D is important for breastfed babies & this covered it! Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Triscari

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could tell these postnatal vitamins were helping me!! I could feel an improvement in my mood and milk supply. I recommend these vitamins to every new mom!! The cheap store brand vitamins don't even come close to the high quality of these pills. LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: L.L

customer_reviews.title: Postnatal must have
customer_reviews.text: I tried one other popular brand for a month before trying actif postnatal vitamins. I felt a difference within two days. I felt refreshed, energetic, and it helped with my supply struggles. I'm 5 months postpartum now and I continue to rave about them.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer bobadilla

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I did a lot of research and compared multiple products before making our decision to go with Actif. The nutrition is there, the price is right, and it's non-GMO which a lot of other brands can't say about their products. My milk supply did increase a bit (must add that I was getting consultation as well) and I just felt better in the mornings compared to the other multi-vitamin I was on before. This is my second purchase and I think it's pretty safe to say I'll be sticking with Actif.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These work very well but make sure to restock in a timely manner. My supply plummeted just from not having them for 2 days. That's how great they are!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great for pre and post baby
customer_reviews.text: I took Actif Prenatal Vitamins while pregnant, and found them easy to swallow and liked the fact that there was no gross taste. After having my son, I started taking these Postnatal Vitamins so that I would continue getting all the vitamins that I needed to recover from delivery and to ensure success in breastfeeding. These vitamins have helped me feel better and I have had no issues exclusively nursing my baby, therefore I would recommend them to other new moms.
customer_reviews.author: Zehra Reza

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: These postnatal vitamins are great, my milk supply is up as well as my energy! I’ve forgot to take them a few times and can tell due to low energy. Swallow easy and are tasteless!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Important for postnatal health
customer_reviews.text: I have taken the Actif prenatal and now love the postnatal vitamins! They are larger than the prenatals, but worth it for the wonderful ingredients. Great for baby and mama and will help will breastmilk which is important to me. Way better than synthetic vitamins and gluten free which is needed for me. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Padawanmom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be intimidated by their size!
customer_reviews.text: The size of the pills and the fact that you have to take two, is intimidating. But fear not, they are surprisingly easy to swallow! I am not the best at swallowing pills, especially large ones and these are easy and tasteless. They don’t float to the roof of your mouth when you chase with water. As long as you follow instructions and drink at least 20 oz of water with them, you don’t need to eat food. As long as I do that, I don’t get nauseous or anything. Love these and I’m on the subscribe and save plan, because of it. I recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Salvo

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Postnatal
customer_reviews.text: I really love this postnatal, I've tried a couple and this one is my favorite by far. I think the only thing is that there isn't too much magnesium in the pills, so I do take an extra supplement to help with the monthly dip in my supply when I'm on my period. I will say overall I do think it does help my supply, as there was a month I did try a different postnatal.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Banafshe

customer_reviews.title: Postpartum Must  Have
customer_reviews.text: If you are a nursing momma you need these. These really saved my supply, the quality is great, the pill is the size of any vitamin that you may get, but otherwise I did not mind the taste and size. My milk came in more when I took these vitamins as a working momma this made a difference of one to two additional ounces per breast per session. As you know, that may not work with you, but I personally noticed a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for 4 months. I feel like they are good quality and has exactly what I need as a post partum, breastfeeding mom! I researched many vitamins and these are by far the best. My milk supply is good and my baby is healthy and chunky. My daughters got the corona virus and my baby and I stayed pretty a-symptomatic. I know it has a lot to do with my consistency in taking my vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: ISABEL

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for a few months now and I’ve been really happy with them. I can take them with or without food and they never upset my stomach. I also appreciate that they provide lactation support. Overall I would definitely recommend these to any postpartum mama!
customer_reviews.author: Kayce F.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job done
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to swallow, despite their size. I appreciate the convenience of having my multi vitamin and lactation supplements in one item, rather than buying 3-4 supplements separately and taking them all each day. Vitamins/Supplements are always a gamble since they aren't regulated, but I started using these right after I got home from the hospital and haven't had any trouble producing enough milk for my baby and having plenty leftover to fill a freezer. I'll be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as great as their prenatals
customer_reviews.text: I took Actif prenatals and I didn’t initially plan on taking a postnatal, but I ended up trying these when I felt that my milk supply was dropping about six months post partum. I felt good about the organic ingredients but I was disappointed that I had to take two pretty large pills per day (I had grown accustomed to the smaller prenatals, which I loved because I only had to take one per day). I had no side effects though, and I felt that they did the trick (the milk issue may have been more placebo than anything).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great postnatal
customer_reviews.text: I’m really enjoying these postnatal! They are very easy to swallow, they don’t necessarily have a flavor which is great, and they have all I need for me and baby. My milk production is always been good since day one, so I don’t know if they are actually promoting milk production, but my milk supply has never decreased or anything...so it might be actually helping !
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Lactation increase!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a postnatal after having my daughter. I really wanted to make sure she was getting what she needed through my breastmilk. I'm always worried about getting things online but these have honestly made me happy. I noticed I had more energy after a couple days and a lactation increase after about a week.. I was getting an ounch more per breast (which was a huge deal for me!) And I have started building up a feezer store of milk!.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani Tabata

customer_reviews.title: Lowered my supply
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I seem to be one of the few for which this vitamin lowered my supply- I was suspecting it was so went off for three days and supply returned in full force lasting steadily throughout the day. Too bad as I was enjoying the energy benefits this vitamin offered. Happy the effects on supply weren’t long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these for about a week now and my milk supply has definitely increased, which is great! I did notice right away that it turns your urine a fluorescent- high lighter shade of yellow which alarmed me at first. The capsule itself of a bit large, but so are most prenatal vitamins I’ve taken. They are coated so they don’t get stuck going down. Over all very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several brands before deciding on a post natal vitamin. I saw a couple of reviews saying that the pills had melted and other negative comments but this was not my experience. I was glad with my purchase. I also have to say I did feel the difference in having this postnatal vs having another brand after the delivery of my first child. I am glad I chose Actif!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They make me feel good and support a breastfeeding mom!
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty big pills but I fell in love with how they made me feel. I'm nursing and wanted something other than a regular prenatal. I wanted something that supported me while nursing and I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality postnatal vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: Currently 5 months postpartum and a breastfeeding mama. I can tell a difference when I’ve let myself run out, I don’t have as much energy and notice my milk supply drops quite a bit. I’ve reordered these 3 times and I think they’re great quality for the price. I haven’t experienced much postpartum hair loss and my nails are still extremely think and long-I’d like to think it’s because of these vitamins. I will definitely keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Battee

customer_reviews.title: Organic & Non-GMO without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: When I had my baby girl (2nd child), I wanted to be more intentional with taking postnatal vitamins. I did a bit of research and found these to be exactly what I was looking for. I felt so much healthier with this baby and have always had more than enough milk production for her, sometimes 8oz at a time! Definitely recommend it to my mamas out there :)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Land

customer_reviews.title: My baby is so smart!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this is the sole factor, but my child is 18 months and she is at a learning and development age 6+ months ahead of her age group! I will be taking these during future pregnancies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep mama balanced!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these postnatal supplements while breastfeeding my 4 month old son and they have helped keep my milk supply up as well as helping me feel energized! Since they are made with organic ingredients they don’t make me nauseous and have made a noticeable difference in my energy levels throughout the day due to keeping my vitamin levels up. Highly recommend to new momma’s who want to keep themselves healthy and balanced while taking care of their little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great all around vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: Before giving birth, I had no idea these existed or that I might need one but I’m glad I chose these. It has awesome ingredients and are easy to take. I’ve ordered a couple of times now and it’s made a difference in my energy and c-section healing and recover. It also has ingredients that support breastfeeding.
customer_reviews.author: D Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great for post baby health
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many pre- and post-natal vitamins and this one is my favorite by far. I believe that this has helped with baby blues, hair loss, increased milk production, and provided that great nutrition cushion for when I don't eat perfectly. I also feel like it doesn't cause constipation like some other vitamins do. I've been taking these for about 6 months now, and I plan to continue as long as I am breastfeeding/pumping.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I really like these vitamins for the lactation benefits but also for the nice nails I get while I have taken them. Doctor agreed they have a lot of beneficial ingredients in them for daily use while breastfeeding.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Postnatal
customer_reviews.text: I chose this postnatal vitamin after reading tons of reviews and researching many products. It is great and I feel like it does what it needs to.
customer_reviews.author: laurensxb

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamins for post natal...
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the few vitamins that I took that didn't hurt my stomach after taking them. My nails and hair got shinier and stronger as well. I also felt better after each feeding/pumping than before taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been taking this postnatal vitamin and She love them. We’re amazed with the results, she said her hair is growing even though she’s breastfeeding and loosing a lot of hair, this vitamins are helping with hair and nails plus it has all she and my baby girl needs during this breastfeeding process. They’re easy to swallow and that’s a big deal for my wife since she hates taking medicine. Over all good quality you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Smell or Aftertaste
customer_reviews.text: These pills are large, but I do t have any issues swallowing pills. They don't leave me with any smelly burps or stomach upset. I take with breakfast and 16 ounces of water.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Quality supplement for postpartum healing!
customer_reviews.text: I was struggling to find a postnatal vitamin that had quality food based ingredients and methylated folate and Vitamin B12. I’m so glad that I found this one! It’s been a key supplement to support me to feel my best in this postpartum time. It includes everything my midwife recommended I take.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K. Bonavoglia

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about vitamins and even though this one is not cheap it was worth buying. I believe it’s crucially important to take postnatal vitamins after birth. Will recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiia B

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamin, not so good for milk supply in my experience.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd bottle of these vitamins. Unfortunately I can’t say if they help with milk production because I can’t tell. I can say for sure that they don’t help when my milk supply drops during my period because I notice a dramatic drop. I like that they are made with natural ingredients, there is no aftertaste and they are easy to swallow. I also don’t notice any difference in my nails or hair, in case you’re wondering that.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Green breastmilk discoloration
customer_reviews.text: These postnatal vitamins gave my breast milk a green discoloration which I think it likely due to the Spirulina in them. My son’s pediatrician says that there is not enough research to say the Spirulina is safe for children to consume and recommended that I stop taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

product_meta.title: Actif Organic Postnatal Vitamin with 25+ Organic Vitamins and Organic Herbs, Nursing and Lactation Supplement, Non-GMO, Made in USA, 90 Count
feature_bullets: ★ The most complete and advanced postnatal vitamin with 25+ organic sourced vitamins and organic herbs
★ Increases breast milk production by up to 50%. The only Postnatal Vitamin with Choline to support healthy brain development.
★ Specifically designed to meet the nutritional needs of nursing mothers. Voted the most trusted brand by women's health specialists in 2020
★ Certified non-GMO, gluten-free, BPA-free. Free of corn and corn derivatives.
★ FREE Shipping, Made in USA, 100% Customer Satisfaction
